items.title: Congress reignites a bipartisan effort to ban hair discrimination
items.description: Previous attempts to pass the legislation banning hair discrimination have stalled in Congress.

items.title: Mediators seek a new deal to release more than half of the hostages in Gaza
items.description: President Trump's Mideast envoy Steve Witkoff is taking part in ceasefire talks in Qatar, the most serious Israel-Hamas talks since Trump took office.
